channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What Price Risk? Unpacking the Equity Risk Premium
item.description: Stocks are a good wager over the long term, on favorable odds. But stocks remain a bet, and investors must grasp how much returns can vary over long time horizons.

item.title: Jamie Dimon says America needs to ‘take a deep breath’ before facing off with China, because the U.S. is actually in a ‘very good position’ to negotiate
item.description: "We have all the food, water and energy we need."

item.title: Equity Income Investing Redux
item.description: No doubt the past year has been difficult for equity income investors. But history, inherent biases, mean reversion, and the current market backdrop point to a comeback.

item.title: Huawei reportedly keeps getting advanced chips, even as the U.S. tries to tighten the screws on China's semiconductor industry
item.description: Huawei's latest smartphone, the Pura 70, features another advanced chip according to a teardown by the consultancy TechInsights.

item.title: Book Review: Enrich Your Future
item.description: This engaging book is simultaneously memorable and humorous. The numerous sports analogies will have you smiling as you absorb Larry Swedroe's unforgettable investment precepts.

item.title: Walmart CEO started his career unloading trailers at the warehouse
item.description: Walmart's CEO went from earning $6.50 an hour to $25 million a year—here are his three tips for climbing the corporate ladder like him

item.title: CAPE Is High: Should You Care?
item.description: A simple analysis shows that Robert Shiller's cyclically adjusted price-to-earnings ratio changed in the 1990s and that mean-reversion concerns may be misplaced. If CAPE changed three decades ago, however, there is nothing preventing it from doing so again.

item.title: Aviation results: European carriers EasyJet and Jet2 fly to new heights, while Airbus prepares to overtake Boeing as headwinds continue
item.description: It's been an eventful few days for aviation players—from Airbus to Heathrow. Here's how they fared.

item.title: AI to the Rescue? Overhauling the US Power Grid on the Path to Net Zero
item.description: Once known as secure and profitable investments, utilities are now viewed as enterprises fraught with financial risks. Investors should favor utilities that employ AI and other digital strategies to minimize damage from natural disasters.

item.title: The financial services gender pay gap in Europe is so large
item.description: Just 183 out of 2,017 people earning more than $1.1 million were female in 2022.
